name: Doll Tote Travel Bag Hold 2 American Girl Dolls 18 Inch Dolls
description:
Our exclusive "Sassafras Doll Tote" easily holds 2 American Girl or other 18 inch dolls as well as clothing and accessories. Designed by a mom with safety, fun and function in mind!
Larger, longer design than the big name brand so it hold dolls securely in place. Interior features 2 safety straps for dolls as well as a closure strap.
Zebra faux fur fabric with solid black lining and bottom is accented with hot pink trim and decorative bow.
Side elasticized pockets hold all the necessary clothing and accessories in place. No more losing dolly or her things!
Item measures 19.5" wide and 14" tall when laying flat.
Individually packaged for easy gift giving.

Exclusively designed and manufactured by My 18 Inch Doll!

FREE SHIPPING on this item!!

categories.name: Doll Clothes for American Girl Dolls

name: Prairie Style Dress and Bonnet for 18 Inch American Girl Dolls Little House on the Prairie
description:
"Blue Bonnet" was designed with "Little House" fans in mind. Now your AG doll can dress like Laura Ingalls with our adorable and exclusive prairie style outfit that resembles a dress that Ma would have made for Laura or Mary.
Blue dress and matching floral calico apron are made in an easy to dress one piece smock with back Velcro closure. Matching calico bonnet with ribbon ties complete the look.
Laura's black boots are sold separately

categories.name: Doll Clothes for American Girl Dolls

name: Colonial Style Doll Dress for American Girl Dolls
description:
"Classic Colonial" looks terrific on Felicity and Elizabeth!
Breath taking beautiful burgundy color with ruffles and white lace trim will be stunning on your favorite 18 inch doll. 
Includes matching lace trimmed pinner cap with burgundy bow detail. 
3/4 length lace trimmed sleeves and lace inset are traditional Colonial touches.
Back Velcro closure makes dressing easy.

categories.name: Doll Clothes for American Girl Dolls

name: Antique Reproduction Wooden Doll Trunk Wardrobe for 18 Inch Dolls like American Girl
description:
From our Signature Line - this beautiful antique reproduction doll trunk holds more clothing, accessories than other versions.  It also holds 2 dolls! 

Includes 2 removable hanging dowels for hanging clothes on both sides of the trunk and 3 generously sized drawers for holding all your little doll accessories.  Includes attached vanity mirror over drawers. If one hanging bar is removed, the trunk will hold 2 dolls and closes easily.  Has side latches and top carrying handle.  Perfect for traveling with your American Girl dolls!

Measures 21" high x 10" deep x 12" wide.

Some distressing is normal for this trunk as it is intended to appear antique.
The natural wood grain is visible as this item is stained, not painted.
This uniqueness adds charm and style to this beautiful item. ï»¿

Beautiful mahogany stained finish.

Dolls, clothing and accessories are not included.

Each trunk ships separately but a discounted shipping rates applies to multiple purchases.

Item ships in original box which may reveal its contents.
